DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety profile GMI-1271 effect thrombus resolution patient distal calf vein Deep Venous Thrombosis ( DVT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Efficacy GMI-1271 Patients With Calf-level Deep Venous Thrombosis ( DVT )
DOC.criteria: Age 1875 year Male female Diagnosed acute isolated calf vein Deep Venous Thrombosis ( DVT ) Willing able participate require evaluation procedure study protocol History presence clinically significant medical condition disease opinion principal investigator Uncontrolled acute lifethreatening bacterial , viral fungal infection Unable treat systemic anticoagulant Current use immunosuppressant , antiplatelets ( aspirin ) , anticoagulant , and/or antiepileptic Diagnosis acute leukemia multiple myeloma undergo active treatment maintenance treatment within past 5 year Current recent cancer treatment Major surgery within 21 day plan surgery study period Female subject pregnant breastfeed Known history HIV , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C Alcoholism drug use Clinically significant cardiovascular disease
